Add user authentication system, profile management, and enhanced theme customization

This commit introduces a complete authentication flow, user profile management, and comprehensive theme customization system for the Maifead RSS Feed Aggregator POC.

Authentication System:
- Create authStore with mock backend using localStorage
- Add login and signup functionality with validation
- Implement AuthPage with tabbed login/signup UI
- Add email format validation and password requirements
- Support user profile data (display name, username, email, avatar)
- Persist authentication state across sessions

Profile Management:
- Create ProfilePage for viewing and editing user information
- Add edit mode with real-time validation
- Implement account deletion with confirmation modal
- Include danger zone section with warning UI
- Show member since date and user statistics
- Redirect to auth page if not authenticated

Theme System Enhancements:
- Create comprehensive theme presets with 10 color options
- Add light and dark mode specific colors for each preset
- Include background, surface, and border colors per mode
- Fix ThemeProvider reactivity to properly apply color changes
- Update SettingsPanel with theme mode toggle and color picker
- Support persistent theme preferences per user

Navigation Updates:
- Add user authentication controls to IconRail
- Show sign in button when not authenticated
- Display user icon and logout when authenticated
- Navigate to profile page on user icon click
- Add /auth and /profile routes to App
